column5: Stone terraces have been built along the left bank of stream, About 110.0m long section of stone terraces is dilapidated.
column6: Construction of 1:3:6 (1 1/2\) ct concrete retaining wall (height 1.5m
column9: each of 0.15m step width & bottom width 0.60m)Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows
column10: Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row
column11: Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure

column5: The Padiyapelella city's garbage is dumped daily on the banks of the Belihul Oya. Toilets have been constructed in Padiyapelella town but have not been opened, resulting in a large number of people who come to the town daily using the banks of Belihul Oya to urinate. Due to the above reasons, the banks of Belihul Oya are in a very dirty state.
